title: Santa sangre (D)
creator_credit: Intersound, Claudio Argento and Alejandro Jodorowsky
brief_description: Like some Fellini-esque nightmare, this mix of circus freaks (tattooed lady, an exotic midget, sad faced clowns), bizarre religious imagery (an armless virgin saint, a cult of holy blood) and hallucinatory imagery (writhing snakes, zombie brides) abounds with disturbing psychological undercurrents. “A strange, violent but ultimately liberating vision.” - Time Out.
